  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <div
          style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}
        >
          
          
          **1.To get [  reportConfigId   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Reports ):
          /reportConfig/list
          (**e.g.** 
            "report_type": "ReconSeer", 
            "id": 108324, 
            "config_code": "DS600", 
            "name": "Daily Rollfoward"
          )
          **2.To get [  processor   ], [   program_id   ]and [  program_name   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( ReconSeer ):
          /alerts/get-user-processor-programs
          (**e.g.**  "program_id": "Global Program",  "program_name": "Program 101",  "processorId": 8,  "processor": "Core Card" )
          
          **3.To get [  reason_id   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Rules & MDM ):
          /alerts/get-user-processor-programs
          (**e.g.**  "id": 15788, "name": "adjmoa")
          
          **4.To get [  assign_user_id   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ):
          /userDetails/users
          (**e.g.**   "first_name": "Read Write", "id": 2046 )
          
          **5.To get [  priority   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ):
          /codes/get-list-by-type
          (**e.g.**   "key": "2", "value": "Low" )
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"report_config_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"DS600"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"processor"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int64"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","default":8}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"program_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"Global Program"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"account_number"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"1234563423"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"card_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"345"}}
        >
